Harpy.name: bunny girl
Harpy.description: The lithe and sexy dame has a wild mane of black hair spilling down her back and wonderfully tanned skin entirely devoid of bikini marks as befits a feral demi such as herself. Atop her head half flopped pale grey bunny ears extend ready to catch the sound of threats and send that athletic form of hers a-running. Anyone seeing her in retreat getting a gander of her twitching grey floof ball of a bunny tail above her cute derriere.
